About Tweet

Hi, I am Miguel Mota.

I am a 21 year old with 3 years of experience in web development, particularly in HTML5, JavaScript, and PHP. Currently I am a front-end developer at XTOPOLY, Inc., a mobile interative agency.

I have passion for what I do and everyday I'm exploring new challenges. This flying lawnmower is my inspiration.
